text: Ezɨ Atrivim Ahas gumazir maba amangizɨ, me Asirian Atrivim Tiklat Pileser bagha ghua kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Kɨ Atrivim Ahas, kɨ nɨn ingangarir gumazim, egha kɨ nɨn borimɨn mɨn iti. Datɨrɨghɨn Sirian atrivim ko Israelian atrivim na ko mɨsosi. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, nɨ izɨ me mɨsoghtɨ, me e gasɨghasighan kogham.”
